name: site2site
author: Alan Cesarini

sections.description: With site2site you can copy any post, page or custom post type from one site to another, in a multisite installation. You can choose which post type you want to copy, and whether to keep the author of the original content or choose a new one.
sections.installation:
1. Upload site2site to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Go to the network admin and activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In the settings menu you will find a new option called Copy content to another site

short_description: site2site copies any content from one site to another in a Wordpress Multisite installation.
description: With site2site you can copy any post, page or custom post type from one site to another, in a multisite installation. You can choose which post type you want to copy, and whether to keep the author of the original content or choose a new one.
